page.title: 20Compilers of the survey
page.content:
Amenity counts and land usage surveys were done in the main by {Beverley Arnett Samantha May { Linda Lines Kirsty Packham { Peter Collard Oliver Price { Chris Diskin Tim Cox { Mark Chadwick} Material for local information and suggestions for video pages were also provided by them together with {Harry Scotting Rebecca Hines} All these are 3rd year students at the Weald Comprehensive School, Billingshurst.
The material was collated by their History teacher,{Richard Shord}who wrote the text, entered the counts and took the photographs. Additional help and survey work was provided by{ {Patrick Shord}aged 9.
